snippet: Label-checking the first daughters Sasha and Malia Obama, now 14 and 11, can be risky for designers if they seem to be capitalizing on the girls as celebrities.
abstract: Eric Wilson notes that much attention has been paid to emerging styles of Pres Obama's daughters Sasha and Malia since his re-election; observes that designers who label-check first daughters run risk of appearing as if they are capitalizing on the girls as celebrities.
lead_paragraph: Label-checking the first daughters Sasha and Malia Obama, now 14 and 11, can be risky for designers if they seem to be capitalizing on the girls as celebrities.

headline.seo: Sasha and Malia Thrust Into Fashion Roles
headline.main: White House Style Watch Expands by 2
headline.print_headline: White House Style Watch Expands by 2
